channel.title: Travis Ci on A Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Travis Ci on A Blog

item.title: Using Travis-CI to Build a Blogdown Site
item.description: Over on the Crunch.io dev blog, I wrote about how we used Travis-CI to automate the building of our various static sites. I thought I’d do the same for my personal blog, though with one twist: using R and the blogdown package on top of Hugo. The thread on this issue in the blogdown repository pointed to Yihui’s guide to building bookdown pages on Travis, as well as a project that had adapted that flow for blogdown.
